info.name: Extract
info.summary: Extract archive from the web interface
info.description:
Extract zip and rar archive.
* **Features :** Zip and rar extraction.
* **Requirements :** * o Rar PHP extension (pecl -v install rar)
* **OR** * o unrar (sudo apt-get install unrar)
* **Note :** Tar.gz will be added in the next version
info.author: Paul Lereverend
